org.nerd4j.csv.formatter

Class CSVFormatterMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nerd4j.csv.formatter.CSVFormatterMetadata

  • public final class CSVFormatterMetadata
extends Object
    Contains the meta-data needed to properly build a new CSVFormatter. This configuration is intended to be used with the CSVFormatterFactory.
    Author:
    Nerd4j Team

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CSVFormatterMetadata()
      Default constructor.

      Returns the character used to escape control characters in the CSV.

      Returns the character used as field separator in the CSV.

      Returns the character used to quote fields in the CSV.

      Returns the character sequence used as record separator in the CSV.
